title: Snoop & Seek Robot
description:
Mindy, Guy Raz, Dennis and the gang are kicking off the 35th annual Sneak and Snoop Championship Games! When things take a turn for chaos in Mindy's Gingerbread Mansion, how will Mindy and Guy Raz find Dennis underneath piles of candy?! With a little help from a robot from MIT, perhaps! It's the who, what, when, where, why, how and WOW of robots!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
